indicator_label.title: Indicator

monitoring_period.title: Monitoring Period
monitoring_period.description: Provide the start and end dates and times that demarcate the monitoring period in question:

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.description: The datasets used in the calculation of the project's impact during this monitoring period and in terms of this indicator:

ipfs_uri_report_calculation.description: IPFS URI of the report produced by the RMD that performed the impact calculation:
